Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: James P.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the ZModo DVR with 4  cameras about a year ago. The included cameras were okay during the day, but at night the onboard lighting was useless.Since then I have purchased two Evertech dome lights including the 600DVL and the 700DVL with varizoom. Both of these were great cameras, but a tad expensive. Then I purchased one of the VideoSecu 1/3" 420 Line Sony Dome cameras.This camera performs almost as well as the more expensive models so I purchased 3 more to round out my setup and saved several $$. The night lighting is strong and even. There may be a difference between the resolutions of the 420 and 600/700 cameras, but I cannot see it on my DVR which is set to record at a D1 quality level.The only reason that I would opt for the more expensive camera would be if I needed the varizoom of the 700DVL. The 700DVL also included the inline OSD adjustments, which I don't really need for my application.In summary, I think this dome camera is a great value and will meet the needs of most people. Just make sure you purchase the Sony 1/3" model.And Linda agrees.Enjoy...Warren!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Papa
Reviews.Content: All I got to say, Ordered Two More, day vision great and night vision was just as great. Hope next two are as good

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: M. Allshouse "SleepSolutionsOfFredericksburg"
Reviews.Content: Easy and quick to install. Currently being used in a medical facility and works just fine for our use. The images were fine too.

Reviews.Title: Better warranty needed
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in December of 2012.  In January 2014 the IR stopped working.  The warranty apparently expired in January of 2013.  I purchased this camera because I needed the IR for night recording on my vehicles.  Something to consider if you need a really dependable camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic night vision camera!
Reviews.Author: aj4mq
Reviews.Content: Since this records infrared to blue, black shirts look extremely faded (because they don't absorb infrared.) Fantastically clear picture at night with minimal light. Fairly easy to install. (Recommend wrapping cord around lower piece when mounting to keep it from dropping. Did handle a drop to the ground, but not recommended. The only thing I wish this could do is pan and tilt. Price is fantastic. (sells for double on store shelves.)

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This has to be one of the best deals for a color camera that has night vision capabilities. . Hooked up easily. Started working as soon as I plugged it in. Very solid housing and good quality for the price. I am completely satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor security
Reviews.Author: George J. Carroll "Author"
Reviews.Content: Product works as a deterrent for any prowlers lurking around my house. One look and they go elsewhere knowing they may be caught on film.

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Good Price, Nice looking
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for the price. The camera is very easy to install and use. The picture is very clear during the day, and still pretty good during night time. The color night view is worthless. I will really recommend this cam to others because of its good quality.

Reviews.Title: Used???
Reviews.Author: Pzano
Reviews.Content: I just sent this camera back!When I opened the crisp box, I was expecting a crisp new camera like I had ordered. Instead, I received what looked like a refurbished unit. There is a scrape on the side of the camera and wear on one of the wire leads, which looks like it had been mounted and used before.Never again with this company.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD image sensor
480 horizontal lines, Minimum Illumination: 0 Lux
Build-in 28 Infrared leds for night vision. f3.6mm Lens for wide view angle
Weatherproof aluminum housing; NTSC signal system
Bonus DC 12V 500mA regulated power supply and security warning Decal included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Day Night Vision Outdoor 28 Infrared LEDs Weatherproof Security Camera Built-in 1/3" Sony CCD 3.6mm Wide Angle View Lens (Power Supply Included) WE7
